title: Maa Aavida Collector
text:
Maa Aavida Collector () is a 1996 Indian <a href="Telugu%20language">Telugu</a>-language <a href="drama%20%28film%20and%20television%29">drama film</a>, produced by Kolli Venkateswara Rao and S. Adi Reddy under the Amma Art Creations banner and directed by <a href="Kodi%20Ramakrishna">Kodi Ramakrishna</a>. It stars <a href="Jagapati%20Babu">Jagapati Babu</a>, <a href="Prema%20%28actress%2C%20born%201977%29">Prema</a> and music composed by <a href="Vandemataram%20Srinivas">Vandemataram Srinivas</a>. The film is dubbed into <a href="Tamil%20language">Tamil</a> as "En Pondatti Collector".
Soundtrack.
The music for the film was composed by <a href="Vandemataram%20Srinivas">Vandemataram Srinivas</a> and released by Shiva Musicals Audio Company.
